welcome_message_body: Welcome to West Allis, the charming city known for its rich history, vibrant local culture, and friendly residents. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at General Mitchell International Airport serves primarily Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at General Mitchell International Airport serves primarily Delta Air Lines and United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.
